to_address: "Speakup is a screen review system for Linux." <speakup@braille.uwo.ca>
subject: Re: mailman config
body:
I've always just followed the directions in the mailman install doc 
and it's just worked.
On Sun, May 13, 2007 at 04:20:55PM -0600, 
TheCreator wrote:
> Hello list,
> I've been trying to get mailman working.
> I've googled was able to find out that I had to edit exim.conf, etc.
> I was wondering how people got the whole webpage thing to display.
> I've gotten mailq taken care of, and all my other questions resolved, but this is one I haven't been able to find with google.
> Thanks,
> ~~TheCreator~~
> _______________________________________________
> Speakup mailing list

-- 
Note that if I can get you to "su and say" something just by asking,
you have a very serious security problem on your system and you should
look into it.
	-- Paul Vixie, vixie-cron 3.0.1 installation notes
